title: Gedolim Mourn Rebbetzin Sorotzkin
body: Gedolim, bnei Torah, and public figures flocked to Telshe-Stone to offer condolences to Rav Shalom Ber Sorotzkin after his mother, Rebbetzin Leah Feiga Sorotzkin, passed away. She was the wife of Rav Binyomin Sorotzkin, rosh yeshiva of Yeshivas Ateres Shlomo.
